summary: This is an email from June 2, 2020, requesting assistance in filling out a chart detailing the specific locations within Jeffrey Epstein's New York mansion where electronic devices were recovered during a search. The sender needs this information to prepare a revised search warrant.

events.title: Email Request for Evidence Location Details
events.description: An email is sent requesting help to fill in a chart specifying the exact locations within Epstein's New York mansion where each electronic device was recovered, to assist in preparing a revised search warrant.

keyFacts: The email is part of the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein, focusing on evidence collection from his New York mansion.
A chart named 'EpsteinNYEvidence.xlsx' is attached, intended to document the specific recovery locations of electronic devices within the mansion.
The sender references a prior chart for devices recovered in the US Virgin Islands (USVI), indicating a parallel evidence-tracking process for multiple Epstein properties.
The information is being compiled to support the preparation of a revised search warrant.
The correspondence demonstrates ongoing investigative work related to Epstein's case as of June 2020.
